backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user authentication, portfolio/watchlist/journal management, alert history storage, and HTTP outcalls for fetching crypto news and price data from external APIs.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that handles state upgrades by preserving existing userData and initializing empty alertHistories map for backward compatibility.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features including toast notifications for trading signals, alert history page with filters, and market heatmap visualization with file mappings and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend TypeScript/React files including pages, components, hooks, services, and utility modules for the crypto trading application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color schemes using OKLCH color space for consistent theming across the application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with viewport meta tag and root div mounting point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for Dashboard, CryptoDetail, Portfolio, Journal, and Alerts pages, wrapped in ThemeProvider with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/AddPositionDialo: Dialog component for adding cryptocurrency positions to portfolio with symbol selection dropdown and quantity input, integrated with usePortfolio hook for mutations.
frontend/src/components/AddTradeDialog.t: Dialog component for adding new trades to the journal with form fields for crypto, direction, entry/exit prices, quantity, date, rationale, and notes. Validates input and calls the addTrade hook to persist the trade.
frontend/src/components/AlertCard.tsx: Card component displaying a trading alert with crypto info, signal badge (buy/sell/hold), price at trigger, timestamp, confidence level, and trigger reason. Formats and displays alert data with appropriate icons and styling.
frontend/src/components/AlertFilters.tsx: Filter controls for alerts page with dropdowns for cryptocurrency and signal type (buy/sell/hold) selection, plus a reset button. Manages filter state and provides callbacks for filter changes.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Authentication button component that toggles between login and logout states using Internet Identity. Initializes user preferences on first login.
frontend/src/components/CandlestickChart: Line chart component using Recharts to display OHLC price data with optional support/resistance levels as reference lines. Transforms raw OHLC data into chart-ready format.
frontend/src/components/CryptoTable.tsx: Table component displaying cryptocurrency market data with columns for rank, name, price, 24h change, volume, market cap, and trading signals. Includes watchlist toggle functionality for authenticated users.
Dashboard panel displaying technical indicators including RSI, MACD, moving averages (SMA/EMA), and Bollinger Bands in a grid of cards. Color-codes RSI values based on overbought/oversold conditions.
frontend/src/components/JournalFilters.t: Filter controls for the trading journal with a search input and outcome dropdown (all/profit/loss). Manages filter state through callbacks to parent component.
frontend/src/components/JournalStats.tsx: Displays trading journal statistics including total trades, win rate, total P/L, and average P/L in a grid of cards. Calculates metrics from completed trades with exit prices.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main application layout component with sticky header, navigation menu (Market, Portfolio, Journal, Alerts), theme toggle, auth button, mobile sheet menu, and footer with caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/MarketSentimentP: Displays market sentiment analysis in three cards: overall sentiment with fear/greed index, top 3 gainers, and top 3 losers based on 24h price changes.
frontend/src/components/PatternLegend.ts: Shows detected candlestick patterns as colored badges (bullish, bearish, or neutral) in a card component.
frontend/src/components/PortfolioSummary: Displays portfolio overview with three metrics: total value, number of positions, and average position size calculated from current prices and quantities.
frontend/src/components/PositionCard.tsx: Card component for individual portfolio position showing crypto name/image, quantity, current price, total value, and a delete button.
frontend/src/components/SignalBadge.tsx: Badge component displaying trading signal type (buy/sell/hold) with icon and tooltip showing reason, confidence, and indicator details.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Theme toggle button that switches between light/dark mode and persists preference to backend via Internet Identity actor when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/TimeframeSelecto: Tab selector component for choosing chart timeframe between 1H, 4H, and Daily intervals.
frontend/src/components/TradeCard.tsx: Card displaying individual trade details including direction, entry/exit prices, quantity, date, P/L calculation, rationale, and notes with delete functionality.
frontend/src/components/TradingSignalsPa: Two-column panel showing active trading signals with badges and support/resistance levels detected from technical analysis.
frontend/src/components/WatchlistPanel.t: React component that displays a user's cryptocurrency watchlist in a card grid, showing crypto images, prices, 24h price changes, and allowing removal of items from the watchlist.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and manages an ICP backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, automatically invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAlertHistory.ts: Custom React hook providing queries and mutations for managing trading alerts, including fetching alert history with filters, 24-hour alerts, alert statistics, and operations to save and clear alerts.
frontend/src/hooks/useAlertNotifications: Custom React hook that monitors top cryptocurrencies for trading signals and displays toast notifications when signals are detected, saving them to the backend alert system.
frontend/src/hooks/useChartData.ts: Custom React hook that fetches OHLC (candlestick) data for a cryptocurrency, detects candlestick patterns, and calculates support/resistance levels based on the selected timeframe.
frontend/src/hooks/useCryptoPrices.ts: Custom React hook that fetches and caches market data for the top 30 cryptocurrencies, with automatic refetching every 45 seconds.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Custom React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validity with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useJournal.ts: Custom React hook for managing a trading journal with CRUD operations for trades and client-side filtering by search term, cryptocurrency, and profit/loss outcome.
frontend/src/hooks/usePortfolio.ts: Custom React hook that provides queries and mutations for managing a user's cryptocurrency portfolio positions, including adding and removing positions with loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useTechnicalIndicator: Custom React hook that calculates technical indicators (RSI, MACD, SMA, EMA, Bollinger Bands) from OHLC data for a given cryptocurrency and timeframe.
frontend/src/hooks/useTradingSignals.ts: Custom React hook that generates trading signals (buy/sell/hold) by analyzing technical indicators for a specific cryptocurrency and timeframe.
frontend/src/hooks/useWatchlist.ts: React hook that manages user watchlist operations using React Query, providing methods to fetch, add, remove, and check if a coin is in the watchlist.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components and setting base typography styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/Alerts.tsx: Alert history page displaying trading signal statistics (buy/sell/hold counts) with filtering capabilities and authentication requirement.
frontend/src/pages/CryptoDetail.tsx: Detailed cryptocurrency view page showing price charts, technical indicators, trading signals, and support/resistance levels with timeframe selection.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page displaying market overview with crypto table, watchlist panel, market sentiment, and auto-refresh functionality.
frontend/src/pages/Journal.tsx: Trading journal page for authenticated users to log and track trades with statistics, filters, and add/view trade functionality.
frontend/src/pages/Portfolio.tsx: Portfolio management page showing user's cryptocurrency holdings with performance metrics, requiring authentication to add and track positions.
frontend/src/services/coingecko.ts: Service layer for fetching cryptocurrency market data and OHLC (candlestick) data from the CoinGecko API.
frontend/src/utils/candlestickPatterns.t: Utility functions to detect common candlestick patterns (Doji, Hammer, Shooting Star, Engulfing) from OHLC data for technical analysis.
frontend/src/utils/marketSentiment.ts: Calculates overall market sentiment (bullish/bearish/neutral) based on average 24h price changes, computes a fear/greed index, and identifies top 5 gainers and losers from cryptocurrency market data.
frontend/src/utils/supportResistance.ts: Identifies support and resistance levels by finding local minima and maxima in OHLC data, merges similar levels within a 2% threshold, and returns the top 5 strongest levels sorted by strength.
frontend/src/utils/technicalIndicators.t: Provides calculation functions for technical indicators including RSI, MACD, SMA, EMA, and Bollinger Bands using historical price data arrays.
frontend/src/utils/tradingSignals.ts: Generates buy/sell/hold trading signals based on technical indicators (RSI oversold/overbought conditions and MACD crossovers) with confidence levels and reasoning.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, container queries, typography plugin, custom animations, and responsive breakpoints for a crypto trading dashboard.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining a crypto swing trading dashboard with features including real-time price tracking, technical indicators, portfolio tracking, Internet Identity authentication, and React/TypeScript frontend with Motoko backend.
